casebody.data:
Albert Dallemand & Company, appellee, v. Rudolph Lederer and Samuel Lederer, trading as Lederer Brothers, appellants.Gen. No. 25,119.Action to recover balance due on purchase price of goods. Judgment for plaintiff. Appeal from the Municipal Court of Chicago; the Hon. Dennis W. Sullivan, Judge, presiding. Heard in this court at the March term, 1919.Affirmed.Opinion filed December 8, 1919.Rehearing denied December 22, 1919.

McSurely, P. J., dissenting.

Sabath, Stafford & Sabath, for appellants; Charles B. Stafford and Thomas M. Zasadil, Jr., of counsel.Moses, Rosenthal & Kennedy, for appellee; S. Sidney Stein and Henry Jackson Darby, of counsel. Mr. Justice Holdom

delivered the opinion of the court.
